overview: Danielle Rodgers was one of the sleekest blondes to ever spread her legs for the camera. Let this classic (pre-internet!) beauty captivate you; give way to your own desire. This is a collection of Danielle's best scenes. She's one of the most sensual ladies we've ever seen, and here she gets to seduce super stars Randy West, Eric Price, and Mike Horner.
title: Deep Inside Danielle
